main event: A group of people observed multiple unidentified flying objects in the sky over Whitesboro, New York on the evenings of July 25 and 26, 1964.
interesting points: The objects changed color from a reddish glow to a bright white light.,The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes and involved multiple observers.,The objects moved rapidly, ascending and disappearing from sight.,Two of the objects were observed again the following night, displaying similar behavior.,The sightings were reported to the U.S. Air Force and noted as unexplained.
witness description: group of people observing the night sky
